title: i
clause_text: i. The Unified Development Control and Promotion Regulations as otherwise applicable to the land situated within Gaothans in Sanctioned Regional Plan, Satara along with the modifications made in it from time to time shall be applicable to the Gaothans shown as existing on Village Maps & Gaothans / extension of Gaothans subsequently declared by Revenue Department under the provisions of Maharashtra Land Revenue Code, 1966.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
